title: Daughters of Delirium
description: The mind is a dark place. Madness is an infection.  Raven More is a high school outcast. Born and raised in Detroit MI, escaping is both her greatest dream and greatest fear. After the incident that hospitalized mother in the hospital and broke her family, Raven is left scarred. Unable to forgive and unable to forget, Ravenâ€™s two best friends are the only people keeping her from total isolation. On her eighteenth birthday she receives a beautiful ring with a dark past.  In a world fighting against madness, Lu is an unwanted princess made queen. Her mother and father are butchered. The queensland faces a new threat. If her people are to survive, she must not make any mistakes. Learning whom to trust will be what makes or breaks her. Discovering the truth is the only way forward.  When two worlds collide, heads will roll. The fight for family, friends, love, and sanity, starts now.  (Warning: Dark themes including self-harm and abuse)
author: A.M. Miller
